title: Roger Williams National Memorial: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons             Summer Hours:  Monday to Sunday 9:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m.    Winter Hours:  Closed Mondays and Tuesdays starting January 4, 2016 to March 31, 2016. The visitor center will be open Wednesday to Sunday 9:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m.    Holidays:Closed on Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Day, and New Year’s Day.
